alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 10:33PM CDT until July 13 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN CHICKASAW COUNTY... At 1032 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Hampton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Fredericksburg around 1040 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County Roads B 54 And V 56, Twin Ponds Park, Boyd, Williamstown, Highway 18 And County V 56, Highway 63 And County B 33 and New Hampton Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
